channel.title: Comments on: Enabling 64-bit VM support on a HP Probook
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: SQLDenis
item.dc:creator: SQLDenis
item.content:encoded:
same is true for VirtualBox as well, see You need to have hardware virtualization enabled if you want to run Windows 8 in Virtual Box

Funny part is when I did that the machine wouldn’t boot….had to wait 10 seconds…gave me a scare initially
